lyric:
[00:00.109]you give your hand to me
[00:05.169]and then you say hello
[00:09.299]and i can hardly speak
[00:12.860]my heart is beating so
[00:16.209]and anyone can tell
[00:21.099]you think you know me well
[00:24.990]well you don't know me
[00:28.200]
[00:31.699]no, you don't know the one
[00:36.800]who dreams of you at night
[00:39.169]and longs to kiss your lips
[00:43.899]and longs to hold you tight
[00:46.990]oh i'm just a friend
[00:51.399]that's all i've ever been
[00:55.169]'cause you don't know me
[00:57.499]
[01:04.978]for i never knew
[01:09.180]the art of making love
[01:13.289]though my heart aches
[01:16.098]with love for you
[01:20.228]afraid and shy
[01:23.499]i've let my chance to go by
[01:28.989]a chance that you might
[01:30.908]love me, too
[01:32.948]
[01:34.978]you give your hand to me
[01:38.299]and then you say good-bye
[01:42.398]i watch you walk away
[01:46.318]beside the lucky guy
[01:50.790]you'll never know
[01:54.889]the one who loves you so
[01:57.098]well, you don't know me
[02:00.059]
[02:37.099]for i never knew
[02:41.239]the art of making love
[02:45.428]though my heart aches
[02:47.969]with love for you
[02:53.299]afraid and shy
[02:57.690]i've let my chance go by
[03:01.099]a chance that you might
[03:02.979]love me, too
[03:05.449]
[03:07.190]you give your hand to me
[03:11.379]and then you say good-bye
[03:14.460]i watch you walk away
[03:19.400]beside the lucky guy
[03:21.428]oh, you'll never ever know
[03:27.290]the one who loves you so
[03:30.319]you don't know me
[03:37.469]you never know
[03:40.909]the one who loves so
[03:46.490]well, you don't know me
[04:06.290]
